title: Ipsen's cheeky new awareness campaign draws attention to serious but little-discussed side effects of prostate cancer
author: Sharon Klahr Coey
description: Despite the cheeky play on words, Ipsen Pharmaceuticals' "Let's Talk About the Hard Things" campaign centers on the very serious side effects of prostate cancer on men's physical and mental health. | Despite the cheeky play on words, Ipsen Pharmaceuticals' "Let's Talk About the Hard Things" campaign centers on the very serious side effects of prostate cancer on men's physical and mental health.
